notice.title: SETI@home now supports Intel GPUs
notice.description: We've released SETI@home 7.03 for Intel GPUs that support OpenCL 1.2. If you have an Intel GPU and want to use it to speed up SETI@home make sure that "Use Intel GPU" is set to "yes" in your Project Preferences. Thanks again to the crew at lunatics.kwsn.net for porting and testing this app.
